name: Mac OS X PLIST Lock File
summary: Lock file used by the application preferences component of Mac OS X 10.7 Lion; saved as an empty file alongside a corresponding .PLIST file (e.g., the lock file for com.myapp.plist is com.myapp.plist.lockfile ; used for marking access to a program's PLIST file when an application is open.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
